#summary how to modify mini-cygwin for one click build.

= Introduction =

one click build for saving your time.can make you lazy,but we need it.

a wizard is on it's way.coming soon.


= Details =

rem  %1 must be the abs path of your project

set TARGET=%1

path c:\cygwin;c:\cygwin\bin;

call ndk.bat

call ndk-build.bat %TARGET%
